text_block_list.text:
A while after El Condor Pasa's grand 
performance in the Selection Race…

She could be seen training with different trainers every day, 
each proposing training menus of their own design.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¿¡Venga, who wants to present their menu today!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'll do whatever training you want me to, so be tough! 
Hard! No mercy! Thank you very muuuch!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: All right! I got something for ya, El Condor Pasa!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
First, run one lap as fast as you can, then hold 
back for the next lap! Repeat for a hundred laps! 
That's the kind of training world champions do!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, world champions! That's a guarantee it'll fit me to a tee! 
Let's get straight to it!!

One day, El Condor Pasa would frantically follow a world 
champion's routine… not having even run a maiden race ——

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I'm up today! My family partners with a university lab 
to get the latest training equipment developed.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: This training gypsum is the brand new fruit of their labor! An excellent invention that increases the load on your body by 20 times, at all times!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Guau! Brand new, excellent invention, 20 times…! 
I don't really get it but it sounds awesome! Let's go!

Another day, she was covered head to toe in a mysterious 
training gypsum, looking stiff as a board ——

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What does it take to reach the world stage?! Spirit! 
Heart! Fortitude! Shout into the sunset, El!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ooooooh! You're filled with passion, Trainer! Okay, here I go!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I am!! I am the one!! The unbeatable! The personification 
of lightning! The best in the world! El Condor Pasaaaaaaa!!!

Yet another day, she was screaming 
herself hoarse into the sunset……
—— Eventually, on one day, I saw her walking unsteadily.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Fwawawah… shleepy shleepy… spinny spinnn… 
I feel kind of dizzy……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Are you feeling alright…? El, don't you think 
you're being too reckless day in, day out?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Fmww… not at all～ El is okay, I'm okay… ¿¡Uy!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¿¡Qué!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Uwawa, I'm sorry! My legs feel a little wobbly ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hn?! It's you!! The False Start Trainer!! 
What a coincidence!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: A-ha-ha, nothing to worry about! As you can see, El is an energetic, motivated, and invincible condor ——

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¿¡Ay ay!? G-Grass!? That's a strange spot 
for your foot to be by accident!!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Dear… Excuse us, Trainer. You weren't hurt, were you?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El has been doing nothing but hard training under a different 
trainer every day of late, I believe it's taking a toll on her body.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Heyheyhey, Grass, Grass, Grass!? 
I can't let that one slide!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I tell you all the time! "El is the strongest horsegirl in the world!"

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Condors are destined to soar high and leave their 
mark at the top! My future is as good as decided!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
El is a condor! Throwing in the towel here…! 
That's not something I can let paaaass!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, there you are, El! I've thought of a menu! 
Please accompany me for training today!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡Uy! It looks like another potential partner has arrived!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Well, that's it for me!! Hasta pronto, Grass!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey! El ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: … Ojojo. I forgot to mention! Trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You've been thinking… really hard… about it, haven't you? I understand♪

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm really looking forward to your training menu! 
Ciao for real now!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Aaah… As ever, she just says whatever she wants and leaves～

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I presume today she'll be aiming to become 
the "world's strongest" with that trainer lady.
choice_data_list: She seems a rather wilful lass.
She seems a rather wilful lass.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hmmm～ I believe she's closer to "determined", but… yes.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Her goals are set high and she carries them proudly, 
giving her all to reach them, without hesitation… 
I do think that's what's so wonderful about her.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
However…… I also believe that sometimes, a person's 
strengths can become their weakness.
choice_data_list: You think she's pushing herself too hard?
You think she's pushing herself too hard?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
That's right～ ……At the very least, spending every day with 
a different trainer means keeping track of her fatigue is likely 
falling by the wayside.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: It's clear to me that she's hopelessly tired.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
…… Should it start posing a risk, I will have to step in with 
more force. Of course, she's not exactly the kind of girl who 
would let a few words stop her in her tracks.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
That reminds me, Trainer, were you not 
interested in scouting her as well?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Excuse my impertinence, but… please, I ask that you consider your plans veeery carefully.
El Condor Pasa possesses a strong will and overwhelming drive.
What am I able to do for her as a trainer…?
